ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Worldly Issues & "Play Nice"
ygData.msgSnippet: On the topic of playing nice,,, last night my almost 17lvl enchanter was trying to kill gnolls in highpass with a 19 druid for a partner.  We were doing fine,
ygData.messageBody:
On the topic of playing nice,,, last night my almost
17lvl enchanter was trying to kill gnolls in highpass
with a 19 druid for a partner. We were doing fine,
till this Lvl 50 Necro arrived and said... "sorry to
do this to you guys, but i need the faction" he then
proceeded to kill everything in site till i gave up
and left 30 minutes later. That is in reallity how
sharing works...

--- Ken Bachman <kbachman@...> wrote:
> From: Ken Bachman <kbachman@...>
>
> I believe that his implication was that players can,
> if they wish to, agree to
> abide by a list. He did not say what would happen
> if one of the parties did NOT
> agree to the list. Numerous postings make it clear
> that guides/GMs can, if they
> wish, impose some other rule even if the list rule
> has been used for months in
> that particular area. And they have.
>
> Kenross Cantoforjado, 45.8 songs, Innoruuk

=====
Harmonie Moonsong
<Lost Souls of Norrath>
